Return only the one-paragraph video description without Markdown formatting or introductory text.

Additionally, describe their **3D position** within the scene as **foreground, middle ground, or background**. If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

In addition, the human-written captions below already describe the subjects (if any) and the scenery in this video but do not capture their spatial composition and movements. The view follows the person as they move from the clear, dark blue sky into the thick, white cloud cover that stretches to the horizon.**

Please note that the video features **salient human subjects**, so you should focus on describing the spatial framing and movements of them.
